Pemiscot County Officials Joint Release

The Pemiscot County Authorities met today to discuss reopening Pemiscot County on May 4th, 2020. Due to our increasing numbers of positive cases for COVID-19 it was agreed by all that Pemiscot County will continue the Stay at Home order til May 18th. The group will reconvene on May 14th to re-evaluate the situation.

Please continue to listen to local radio stations, watch Facebook and also websites for the upcoming order.

We cannot express enough to properly wash your hands, disinfect regularly, stay home if you are sick, and practice safe distancing; putting space between yourself and others even if they are not sick, in order to reduce illness transmission.

If you have any questions you can contact the Pemiscot County Health Center at 573-359-1656.
